```{r}
# import libraries
library(dplyr)
library(ggplot2)
library(pracma)
```

```{r}
seq(-15*pi, 15*pi, by=0.1) %>%
  expand.grid(x=., y=.) %>%
  ggplot(aes(x=x, y=y, fill=erf(sec(x) - sec(y)))) +
    geom_tile() +
    scale_fill_gradientn(colours=c("#000000", "#FFFFFF")) +
    theme_void() +
    theme(legend.position="none")
```
